message.name: EVIDENCE_MARITALSTATUS_UPDATED
message.locale: Marital status evidence details of case %1s has been updated for %2s.
تفاصيل دليل الحالة الاجتماعية للحالة %1s تم تعديلها إلى %2s

message.name: EVIDENCE_EDUCATION_UPDATED
message.locale: Education evidence details of case %1s has been updated for %2s.
تفاصيل دليل الحالة الاجتماعية للحالة %1s تم تعديلها إلى %2s

message.name: BIRTHANDDEATH_UPDATED
message.locale: Birth and Death evidence details of case %1s has been updated for %2s.
تفاصيل دليل الميلاد والوفاة للحالة %1s تم تعديلها إلى %2s

message.name: INCOME_UPDATED
message.locale: Income evidence details of case %1s has been updated for %2s.
تفاصيل دليل الدخل للحالة %1s تم تحديثها إلى %2s.

message.name: MOI_UPDATED
message.locale: The details of case %1s for %2s does not match the details in the Ministry of Interior (MoI) data, so an SMS has been sent to the person.
تفاصيل الحالة %1s إلى %2s لا تطابق التفاصيل في بيانات وزارة الداخلية (MoI)، لذا تم إرسال رسالة قصيرة إلى الشخص.

message.name: QID_LENGTH
message.locale: QID should be 11 digit Number.
رقم البطاقة الشخصية يجب أن يكون 11 رقم.

message.name: PHONE_NO
message.locale: The Phone Number entered is not in a valid format. It must be a 8 digit number.
رقم الهاتف الذي تم إدخاله غير صحيح. يجب أن يكون مكون من 8 أرقام.

message.name: EDUCATION_COMMENTS
message.locale: CD response - School name is %1s.
استجابة CD - اسم المدرسة هو %1s.

message.name: MARITAL_COMMENTS
message.locale: CD response - Event Date %1s and Spouse QID is %2s.
استجابة CD - تاريخ الحدث %1s ورقم البطاقة الشخصية للزوج هو %2s.

message.name: INCOME_COMMENTS
message.locale: CD response - Income amount is %1s.
استجابة CD - مبلغ الدخل هو %1s.

message.name: BIRTH_COMMENTS
message.locale: CD response - Date of birth is %1s.
استجابة CD - تاريخ الميلاد هو %1s.

message.name: DEATH_COMMENTS
message.locale: CD response - Date of death is %1s.
استجابة CD - تاريخ الوفاة هو %1s.

message.name: MOI_COMMENTS
message.locale: The evidence has been updated based on Ministry of Interior (MoI) data.

message.name: SCREENING_PERSON
message.locale: %1s with QID %3s and Phone number %2s has screened positive for Social Assistance

message.name: INF_READY_FOR_FINAUDITOR_REVIEW
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s is Ready for Financial Audit review.
الحالة %1s من النوع %2s إلى %3s جاهزة لمراجعة تدقيق الحسابات المالية.

message.name: INF_READY_FOR_APPROVAL_REVIEW
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s is Ready for Case Audit review.
الحالة %1s من النوع %2s إلى %3s جاهزة لمراجعة تدقيق الحالة.

message.name: INF_REJECT_OF_APPLICATION_REVIEW
message.locale: Application %1s for %2s has been rejected.
الطلب %1s إلى %2s تم رفضه

message.name: PHONE_NUMBER_EMPTY
message.locale: There is no mobile phone number registered for the applicant.

message.name: UNIVERSALACCESS_ACCOUNT_EXISTS
message.locale: There is an existing universal access account for the applicant.

message.name: PASSWORD_NOT_MATCHING
message.locale: The entered passwords do not match.

message.name: WRONG_PASSWORD
message.locale: The entered current password is incorrect, please try again.

message.name: UNIVERSALACCESS_ACCOUNT_DOESNOTEXIST
message.locale: There is no existing user account for the entered user ID.

message.name: USER_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD
message.locale: Hi %1s, your self-service username is your Qatari ID and password is %2s. You can change the password after logging in. Please visit the URL %3s for more information and to download MOLSA mobile application.
مرحبا %1s، اسم المستخدم هو رقمك الشخصي وكلمة المرور هي%2s ، بإمكانك تغيير كلمة المرور بعد تسجيل الدخول. للمزيد من المعلومات وتحميل تطبيق الجوال الرجاء زيارة الرابط التالي %3s.

message.name: INVALID_USERNAME
message.locale: The username you entered is incorrect.
اسم المستخدم الذي أدخلته غير صحيح.

message.name: ERR_PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT
message.locale: The password must be at least %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_PASSWORD_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The password can be at most %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_PASSWORD_MIN_SPECIAL_CHARS
message.locale: The password must contain at least %1n number(s) and/or special characters.
